task.title: Include a shared audience in a Target activity
task.shortdesc: Audiences created in the Marketing Cloud or published from Analytics are available on the Segment page in Adobe Target.

context.p: For example, you can create campaign activities based on Analytics conversion metrics and audience segments created in Analytics.

step.cmd: Create an audience in the Marketing Cloud or in Adobe Analytics.
Access Adobe Target, then navigate to the Segment list.
On the Segment page, click Import Marketing Cloud Audiences

stepresult.p: This option displays the segment for use in activities.
See Segments in Adobe Target for more information.
